name: My CV
description:
This game is a Playable version of my CV the aim is to platform to each header and press the "I" key to read each section.

WASD to move

Space to Jump (press space on the wall to wall jump)

i to interact

ESC to close game on windows

Platforming

Wall jumps

Basic interactions

This was a solo project developed by Connor with music sorced from:

Grateful by Scandinavianz & Aylex | https://soundcloud.com/scandinavianz

https://soundcloud.com/alexproductionsmusic

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
